referral.title: Boost Your Wallet!
referral.description: Invite friends with your referral code to earn 1% on their deposits, and they'll get a $10 bonus just for signing up!

dialog.title: Entering {{tableName}}

store.title: Item Store
store.description: Purchase special buffs to gain an edge. Your Balance:

1.name: Single Revive
1.description: Gives you a second chance! Automatically revives your snake once upon death.

2.name: Double Revive
2.description: The ultimate comeback! Revives your snake twice in a single game.

3.name: Triple Revive
3.description: Become nearly invincible. Three revives to secure your victory.

4.name: Obstacle Shield
4.description: Play one game without any obstacles appearing. Guarantees a clear field.

dialog.title: Confirm Purchase
dialog.description: This will deduct ${{price}} from your wallet to buy {{itemName}}. Are you sure?

wallet.title: My Wallet
wallet.description: Manage your funds, deposits, and withdrawals.

deposit.title: Deposit USDT
deposit.description: Send USDT (TRC20) to the address below, then submit your deposit amount for admin approval.

fee.title: Fee Calculation
fee.description: A 2% fee of ${{fee}} will be deducted. You will receive ${{received}}.

withdraw.title: Withdraw USDT
withdraw.description: Withdraw funds to your TRC20 wallet.

conditions.title: Withdrawal Conditions
conditions.description: You must have at least 5 active referrals (Current: {{referralsCount}}) and a minimum total deposit of $100 (Current: ${{totalDeposits}}) to be eligible.

limit.title: Withdrawal Limit
limit.description: You can only withdraw up to 2% of your total balance every 48 hours.

history.title: Transaction History
history.description: A record of your recent deposits and withdrawals.

referrals.title: Referral Program
referrals.description: Invite friends and earn a 1% commission on their deposits. Your friend receives a $10 bonus for signing up!

yourInfo.title: Your Referral Info
yourInfo.description: Share your code or link. Your friend gets a $10 bonus for signing up, and you'll earn a 1% commission on every deposit they make.

list.title: Your Referrals

list.noReferrals: You haven't referred anyone yet. Share your code to get started!

insufficientFunds.title: Insufficient Funds
insufficientFunds.description: Please deposit to play at this table.

purchaseSuccess.title: Purchase Successful!
purchaseSuccess.description: You bought {{itemName}} for ${{price}}. It will be available for your next game.
